'''''Minecraft: The Manga'' Volume 9''' is the ninth {{W|tankōbon}} volume of the ''[[Minecraft: The Manga]]'' series.

== Chapters ==
*41. Protect the Last Cherry Tree!! (最後のサクラを守りきれ!!, ''Saigo no Sakura o Mamori Kire!!'')
*42. A MOD of Disaster Sleeping in the Ruins!! (遺跡に眠る災いのMOD!!, ''Iseki no Nemuru Wazawai no Moddo!!'')
*43. A Reunion with Navy, then a Farewell!? (ネイビーとの再会、そして別れ!?, ''Neibī to no Saikai, Soshite Wakare!?'')
*44. Recover Your Friends' Memories! (仲間の記憶を取りもどせ!!, ''Nakama no Kioku o Tori Modose!!'')
*45. World Crisis! Destruction King Abyss!! (世界の危機!! 崩壊王アビス!!, ''Sekai no Kiki!! Hōkai-ō Abisu!!'')
